job_description:
• Minimum QualificationsBachelor’s or Master’s degree in Electrical / Computer Engineering or Computer ScienceExpertise with hardware bring-up and bench-top measurements with lab equipment (e.
• Digital oscilloscope, logic analyzer, power supply) for signal and power integrityBasic understanding of both low-speed and high-speed digital interfacesFamiliarity with power electronics, especially DC-DC converters.
